title: Supermarket Sweep
overview: Rylan Clark-Neal hosts a remake of the iconic gameshow Supermarket Sweep. Three pairs of shoppers go wild in the aisles as they compete in the ultimate supermarket challenge to win a £3,000 prize. Along with the classic Supermarket Sweep quizzes, trolley dashes and pastel jumpers, the rebooted show features exciting new games, challenges and some famous faces...
